oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Importance of linear and nonlinear phase for efficient four wave mixing in optical fibers
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RAMASWAMY, D
RAMARAO, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: zero-dispersion wavelength
four wave mixing
phase matching
optical nonlinear effects
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Experimental and theoretical results are presented to indicate the insufficiency of the existing theoretical model to predict the efficiency of four wave mixing in fibers near the zero dispersion wavelength. An appropriate design is suggested for efficient sideband generation, which would be useful in multi-wavelength source design.
